analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xcc298d25b66b0f5cb934bdc58aaaae4b51bcb358.sol:
	Contract KungfuToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xcc298d25b66b0f5cb934bdc58aaaae4b51bcb358.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xcc298d25b66b0f5cb934bdc58aaaae4b51bcb358.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xcc298d25b66b0f5cb934bdc58aaaae4b51bcb358.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xcc298d25b66b0f5cb934bdc58aaaae4b51bcb358.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
